description: Deals Ankh damage to all foes, decreased by number of foes.
name: attrition();
note:
<Learn Cost>
Item 101: 1
</Learn Cost>


<Custom Show Eval>
if (!user.isStateAffected(124)) {
visible = true;
} else {
visible = false;
}
</Custom Show Eval>

<Damage Formula>
// Check if the damage has already been calculated
if (this._calculatedBaseDmg) {
  // Set the damage to the cached amount
  value = this._calculatedBaseDmg;
// Otherwise
} else {
  // Get the total number of enemies
  var totalEnemies = target.friendsUnit().aliveMembers().length;
  // If there is 1 enemy total
  if (totalEnemies === 1) {
    // Use this formula
    this._calculatedBaseDmg = 600;
  // If there are 2 enemies in total
  } else if (totalEnemies === 2) {
    // Use this formula
    this._calculatedBaseDmg = 400;
  // If there are 3 enemies in total
  } else if (totalEnemies === 3) {
    // Use this formula
    this._calculatedBaseDmg = 200;
  // if there are 4 or more
  } else {
    // Use this formula
    this._calculatedBaseDmg = 125;
  }
  // Set the value equal to the calculated amount
  value = this._calculatedBaseDmg;
}
</Damage Formula>

description: Deals Ankh damage to all foes and destroy their buffs, increasing your damage for each buff cleansed.
name: attrition().rankEX;
note:
<Pre-Damage Eval>
var bonusdmg = bonusdmg || 0;
for (var i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
  // If it is a buff...
  if (target._buffs[i] > 0) {
    // Then increase the damage by a formula.
    bonusdmg += 1;
  target._buffs[i] = 0;
  }
}
bonusdmg = 1.0 + (bonusdmg * 0.25);
value *= bonusdmg;
value = Math.ceil(value);
</Pre-Damage Eval>
